DOC.brief_summary: Twenty ( 20 ) subject present renal stone candidate FURS ( flexible ureteroscopic renal surgery ) undergo single FURS procedure kidney stone part study , use study device . These subject randomize stone breaking treatment stone dusting .
DOC.brief_title: Utilizing Holmium Laser FURS Renal Stone Lithotripsy Comparing Stone Breaking vs. Stone Dusting Settings
DOC.criteria: 1 . Subject old 18 year age 2 . Subject diagnose renal calculus meet follow criterion : Largest stone measure 2cm single diameter le 0.8cm defined Xray CT. Accumulative stone burden ( addition stone diameter ) 2.5cm . 3 . Subject candidate FURS procedure 4 . Subject willing sign Informed Consent Form 1 . Subject undergone previous treatment stone kidney 2 . Subject require another , concomitant procedure , FURS , perform treatment session . 3 . Female subject pregnant 4 . Concomitant anticoagulant medication suspend surgery
